p: First, 5 mg of Trolox ((±)-6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetra-methylchromane-2-carboxylic acid) was dissolved in a mixture of methanol and water (70:30) and diluted to 100 mL. To obtain standard calibration curves, the solutions of four concentrations (200, 100, 50, and 25 mmol/L) of Trolox were prepared. Then, 0.1 mL of each Trolox solution was allowed to react with 3.9 mL of working solutions of ABTS • + and DPPH •. Absorbance values were measured after 15 and 30 min at 734 and 515 nm, respectively. Linear calibration curves (see Figure S2) were obtained and their parameters were used for further calculations of antioxidant activity. All measurements were done in triplicate.
